title: The utmost best hotel in London and probably worldwide
text:
I have stayed here just before Christmas, having no expectations but a long history of trying the best hotels worldwide.
Starting with my check-in, there wasn't a single thing that has disappointed me, quite to the contrary - The Soho Hotel never stopped surprising me in a positive way.
The lady working at the reception was very efficient and polite, gave me exactly the room that I wanted to have, and even an upgrade.
Even though the location of Soho is pretty noisy, those rooms facing the backyard are absolutely quiet, with a fantastic window isolation, and the windows open of course.
There is just everything you would need in the room, and all is functioning.
There was in addition some small gifts from the management in the room, and those RikRak products smell fantastic.
Concierge was one of the best I have ever met in my life, even though unfortunately I don't remember his name.
Breakfast room service was fabulous, a really good price for what you are getting.
The spirit at the bar was just right, and the quality of cocktails is amazing.
Writing this review brings back those great memories which warm my heart.
I hope to visit this hotel again soon. And many thanks to the GM who manages to operate this project successfully.
